## Source: amazon-inspector (c2e125bb096a79fe5c600e1826a5926312c29943a9f33edb1f2efbb0e0416203)
The package conmiyagi-map was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c8f5de6d3e2bef38a4fe380906eec23e42ccc849900e74efb21812bbb3afc5ec)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'conmiyagi-map' @ 0.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
